Notes:
Kenya is an interesting edge case. The mobile money system has tons of transactions, but there are only 3 MMOs participating, and zero banks or MFIs. Similarly PesaLink has multiple participants and lots of transactions, but only doing P2P payments among banks. PesaLink is also a "private-association" IPS - it's governed by an associated made up of entirely private sector participants.
